Articles.Content:
Hello to all who say "MOAR BOOSTERS".

I am now joining the forum as you can see, but I've had the game for some while, I started in .18.2 around Christmas time, but I was playing the .13.3 demo since I think August last year. KSP is probably the best game I will ever play in my life, (and I'm thirteen for anyone who asks). And please don't be surprised that a person so 'young' could understand this game, because youths know more than you think... And yes, I do understand Orbital Physics. I've been reading this forum since a few weeks after I got KSP, so I think that kind of know the place, but I do know that this is an amazing place.

And just a question, Is anyone else here from Trinidad and Tobago? Or anywhere in the Caribbean?

Signed,

TheTriniFlyer
I am not from Trinidad, but I have friends from there! Besides, I think we are similar in other ways. Welcome!!
